results.title: Amada Senior Care - Poway Chamber of Commerce
results.content: Sign Up for Our Chamber News & Communications! # Amada Senior Care. ##### Categories. In-Home Care & Transportation2023 Award WinnerHealth & WellnessLiving with Dementia. * 16776 Bernardo Center Drive Suite 101 San Diego CA 92128. ### About Us. We offer compassionate, individualized and quality non-medical, in-home care for seniors. This includes personal care (bathing, dressing, toileting, etc), general support care (companionship, errands, meal preparation, light housekeeping, household organization, etc) and dementia care (safety, cueing, daily routine). We also provide long term care insurance claims advocacy for policyholders. This includes free policy reviews and assistance through the often confusing claims process. We offer a great place to work with 24/7 office support, flexible scheduling, strong values, weekly pay, medical benefits, matching 401(k), recognition for hard work, and rewards for that hard work. Come join our Amada Family! https://www.amadaseniorcare.com/san-diego-senior-care-central/. ### Rep/Contact Info. ##### John Boodhansingh. ##### John Boodhansingh Owner. ##### Share. Print Email Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Pinterest. ##### Tell a Friend.

results.title: In-Home Senior Care in San Diego Central, CA
results.content: The owners of Amada Senior Care San Diego Central, John and Melissa Boodhansingh, both come from large families and grew up with grandparents living with them.
